org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

Interface MetricsHeapMemoryManagerSource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    BaseSource
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MetricsHeapMemoryManagerSourceImpl

    @InterfaceAudience.Private
public interface MetricsHeapMemoryManagerSource
extends BaseSource
    This interface will be implemented by a MetricsSource that will export metrics from HeapMemoryManager in RegionServer into the hadoop metrics system.

      • updateBlockedFlushCount

        void updateBlockedFlushCount(long blockedFlushCount)
        Update/Set the blocked flush count histogram/gauge
        Parameters:
        blockedFlushCount - the number of blocked flush since last tuning.

      • updateUnblockedFlushCount

        void updateUnblockedFlushCount(long unblockedFlushCount)
        Update/Set the unblocked flush count histogram/gauge
        Parameters:
        unblockedFlushCount - the number of unblocked flush since last tuning.

      • setCurBlockCacheSizeGauge

        void setCurBlockCacheSizeGauge(long blockCacheSize)
        Set the current blockcache size used gauge
        Parameters:
        blockCacheSize - the current memory usage in blockcache, in bytes.

      • setCurMemStoreSizeGauge

        void setCurMemStoreSizeGauge(long memStoreSize)
        Set the current global memstore size used gauge
        Parameters:
        memStoreSize - the current memory usage in memstore, in bytes.

      • updateMemStoreDeltaSizeHistogram

        void updateMemStoreDeltaSizeHistogram(int memStoreDeltaSize)
        Update the increase/decrease memstore size histogram
        Parameters:
        memStoreDeltaSize - the tuning result of memstore.

      • updateBlockCacheDeltaSizeHistogram

        void updateBlockCacheDeltaSizeHistogram(int blockCacheDeltaSize)
        Update the increase/decrease blockcache size histogram
        Parameters:
        blockCacheDeltaSize - the tuning result of blockcache.

        void increaseTunerDoNothingCounter()
